channel.title: Personal website challenge!
channel.description:
[size=12pt][font=trebuchet ms]Hey guys. I've been getting bored of re-creating the same type of template over and over again. So I've decided to ask people I don't know to give me a nice clean website template for me to code from scratch. I have only one rules. The website template cannot be Flash, SWiSH etc.. Has to be pure HTML and CSS. I'll post a picture of the design once it's completed and I'll keep updating this thread with images.
Thanks, Sibor[/font][/size]

item.title: Personal website challenge!
item.dc:creator: @Sibor Sibor
item.description:
@Sibor wrote:

RSCShadow:

I meant like what do you want us to do? Give you a website template for you to code from scratch? I have no idea what you mean by that. Do you want us to tell you what to make or do you want us to give you website templates?

Ohh… yes… I would like you to give me a clean website template to make from scratch and if you need a website for your RSPS, I’ll make one.

Read full topic

item.title: Personal website challenge!
item.dc:creator: @Sibor Sibor
item.description:
@Sibor wrote:

RSCShadow:

I’m confused on the “rules” and you seem pretty vague.

The rules is that it can only be HTML/CSS oriented, no Flash, SWiSH, etc.

Ruby:

If you’re bored diversify into other languages. Don’t stick with the same things all the time.

I’ve tried this, lol. I don’t have the patience. I can read PHP, JavaScript and jQuery just can’t write the code. I’m trying though, lol. I want to be a PHP pro.

aciraccar:

try making a good website using a web builder >;)

Umm… no thank-you. I like to make my websites via ground up.

Well, in the past half hour to 45 minutes, I’ve mad a website design for my friends iXat chat. Here is a picture of only page I did (home).
http://prntscr.com/o9wfx

Tell me how you like. Right now I made it using tables. I’m converting it to div blocks now.

Read full topic
